Question: On March 7, 2010, this person sang The Beatles' "In My Life" in tribute to deceased artists at the 82nd Academy Awards.
Hints: This person's appearances were joint performances with the Dixie Chicks.
This person had thoughts of retiring by the time he played the massive Rock in Rio festival in Rio de Janeiro in January 1985.
During the recording sessions, this person fell back into his drug habit, using heroin and methedrine.
